string-array.name: personal_qns
string-array.item: Are you currently taking any medications and/or supplements?
Have you ever been admitted to a hospital for a serious illness or injury (ie: stroke, heart attack, car accident, etc)?

string-array.name: family_qns
string-array.item: Have any of your relatives had Inflammatory Bowel Disease?
Have any of your relatives had cancer?

string-array.name: social_qns
string-array.item: Has anyone in your family or home ever physically or verbally hurt you?
Do you need assistance with getting around (ie: cane, wheel chair, etc.)?
How many children do you have?
Did you sustain any injury during delivery?
When last did you take a recreational drug?

string-array.name: surgical_qns
string-array.item: Have you ever had a colonoscopy?

string-array.name: review_qns
string-array.item: "What do you think about the doctor's communication level?"
"What do you think about the doctor's patient care?"

string-array.name: intro_texts_arr
string-array.item: "Bringing health care to your doorstep.\n\n Speak to qualified doctors, get first aid tips and much more"
"Enter your basic details and choose a password"
"Validate your phone number in 2 simple steps. \n\n First enter the number"
Enter 6-digit code sent to you via SMS to the number provided.
"Safe Doktor is that simple! \n Go on! Just try it."
